subject: Review paper with CodeRabbit
description:
**Type:** Task

**Description:** Review the paper for quality using CodeRabbit code review.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] CodeRabbit review completed
- [ ] Feedback documented

**Verification:**
- type: manual-check
- command: CodeRabbit review output
- expected: Review completed with feedback

learnings: Pixee.ai 1.7x defect stat is single vendor-sourced - potential bias
GitHub Spec Kit has 50K+ stars not 28K
Economics section chain-of-estimates needs ranges not single numbers
